title: Reopening the Economy Amid Virus Spikes
itunes:title: Reopening the Economy Amid Virus Spikes
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. We get Businessweek Economics with Milton Ezrati, Chief Economist at Vested. He shares his insight on the economy reopening amid spikes in virus cases. Ryan Kelley, Portfolio Manager at Hennessy Funds, discusses gas and energy investing. And we Drive to the Close with Dave Mazza, Managing Director at Direxion.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
